SA22nagpancu:570: yatra sthito mahāyogī tad bhaved yuganaddhakam //
SA22nagpancu:572: ityevaṃ kalpanā nāsti tat taddhi yuganaddhakam //
SA22nagpancu:578: utthānaṃ ca tato yatra samantād yuganaddhakam //
SA22nagpancu:579: Pk_5.13 saṃvṛtiṃ paramārthaṃ ca pṛthag jñātvā vibhāgataḥ /
SA22nagpancu:581: Pk_5.14 tathātalambanaṃ naiva vyutthānaṃ yatra naiva hi /
SA22nagpancu:591: Pk_5.19 kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kṛtvābhinnaṃsvabhāvataḥ /
SA22nagpancu:592: yā sthitiryogināṃ buddhā yuganaddhaṃ vadanti tat //
SA22nagpancu:596: iti yā kalpanābhinnā yatra tad yuganaddhakam //
SA22nagpancu:598: yaḥśāntiṃ vetti yogīndraḥ sa prāpto yuganaddhakam //
SA22nagpancu:599: Pk_5.23 evaṃ vai yaḥ sthito yogī yuganaddhakrame sthitaḥ /
SA22nagpancu:600: ucyate sa hi sarvajñaḥ tattvadarśī ca viśvadhṛk //
SA22nagpancu:604: buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvatvaṃ sarvaiśvaryaṃ tathaiva ca // Pk_5.25 /
SA22nagpancu:612: bhāvayed yuganaddhaṃ tu caryāṃ cāpi tadanvayām //
SA22nagpancu:613: Pk_5.30 yathātmani tathā śatrau yathā bhāryā tathātmajā /
SA22nagpancu:614: yathā mātā tathā vaiśyā yathā ḍombī tathā dvijā //
SA22nagpancu:615: Pk_5.31 yathā vastraṃ tathā carma yathā ratnaṃ tathā tuṣam /
SA22nagpancu:616: yathā mūtraṃ tathā madyaṃ yathā bhaktaṃ tathā śakṛt //
SA22nagpancu:617: Pk_5.32 yathā sugandhi karpūraṃ tathā gandhamamedhyajam /
SA22nagpancu:618: yathā stutikaraṃ vākyaṃ tathā vākyaṃ jugupsitam //
SA22nagpancu:619: Pk_5.33 yathā rudrastathā vajrī yathā rātrīstathā divā /
SA22nagpancu:620: yathā svapnaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā naṣṭaṃ tathā sthitam //
SA22nagpancu:621: Pk_5.34 yathā saukhyaṃ tathā duḥkhaṃ yathā duṣṭastathā sutaḥ /
SA22nagpancu:623: Pk_5.35 evaṃ jñātvā cared jñānī nirviśaṅkastu sarvakṛt /
SA22nagpancu:625: iti prakāśya puṇyaṃ yat prāptaṃ pañcakramamanuttaram /
SA22nagpancu:639: na satyā nāsatyā na ca tadubhayī nāpyanubhayī
SA22nagpancu:644: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA22nagpancu:645: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
